exercises.name: Barbell Bench Press
exercises.notes: Focus on controlled eccentric and full range of motion.

exercises.name: Incline Dumbbell Press
exercises.notes: Emphasize upper chest; stop 1 rep before form breakdown.

exercises.name: Cable Fly
exercises.notes: Constt tension; slow squeeze at peak contraction.

exercises.name: Triceps Pushdown
exercises.notes: Elbows locked in; avoid shoulder movement.
